thread.section_title: Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: spacious room, quiet hotel
thread.title_full: spacious room, quiet hotel - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: lauren t
title: spacious room, quiet hotel
text:
overall our stay was great. we were upgraded to a suite upon arrival, and the room was incredibly spacious (bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, eating area and living room). the staff was all exceptionally friendly and considerate.
the *only downside was the wifi connection. I'm not sure if it was our room's location or not, but I would have gladly taken a smaller room for a stronger wifi signal.
